sentences.sContent: Dad started going bald when he was in his thirties.
sentences.sCn: 爸爸在三十多岁的时候开始谢顶。

sentences.sContent: He combed his hair and tried to hide his bald patch (=  part of someone’s head where there is no hair  ) .
sentences.sCn: 他梳了梳头，试图把头顶的秃块遮掩起来。

synos.tran: [地理]秃顶的；光秃的；单调的；无装饰的

phrases.pCn: （美）秃鹰（美国的国鸟）；比喻秃头的政治家

trans.tranOther: having little or no hair on your head
